title: Honor Capsules
body: What are the drop rates of honor capsules? I have only gotten 1 ever and that was when I first got honor 3. Now I am honor 4 playing a good amount of games every day probably about 40 every week and I have never gotten another honor capsule...???

replies.body: We don't have info on the drop rates, but it turns out the key fragments within go towards your [12 per ~28 day cap](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).  If you've already hit your cap then you may need to wait a bit for both fragments and its drop rates to refresh.

Hey Porocles o/

Sorry to bring up that old post, but I was recently directed to it as a proof that you can't exceed the 12 Frags/28 days cap, even with Honor Capsules.

Before reading that post, my previous understanding was that you can get 12 **Drops** and that each Drop was either 1 normal Frag OR 1 Capsule that can contain multiple Frags. So when you get a Capsule, you can get more than 12 Frags for those 28 days.

But this post here seems to contradict that understanding. Can you clarify, please?

Hey, yeah way to necropost!  :P  I know it can get pretty confusing, I'm really sorry for wording it so!  You get 12 drops, they can be either a fragment or a capsule.  What's in the capsule won't count towards the limit.  Let me know if that clears things up!

-- There was some confusion on our side as well, so it's super important we give accurate info out.

That sounds so stupid, what's even the point of honor capsules? Just to make us feel like we're getting something from honor when we really don't?
you should be happy riot gives free stuff lol

Riot created the honor system to try to make people be nicer in game.
The system was supposed to distinguish itself from the old system by giving out free stuff based on how honorable you have been.
It turns out you don't actually get anything more from having higher honor levels.
Im happy that riot gives free stuff but giving the same amount or even more to people that are 2 honor levels lower seems a bit...weird
I think those that are lvl 5 at the end of the year will get something, but i'm not sure

I have been honor 4 for a while, also gotten a lot of key fragment - but only a single honor capsule... The drop rate is so low that it really doesn't make a difference. Especially if you get a crappy champion shard that worth 450ip.
I always try to be nice, but with these rates I really don't feel rewarded for it, rather ridiculed.
I have never received an honor capsule and I hit honor 4 like 2 weeks ago
